author: DBrick
title: Amazing set for an almost forgotten spaceship
review:
To be honest, this set looked so amazing that I had to buy it. Not only because is one of the OT spaceships (despite that it's one that is only shown 1 or 2 minutes), but else because it looks AMAZING.

Seems like a space Ferrari and has a size that fits almost everywhere (not like the Falcon).

Building process is not so complicated. It took me 3 hours to build it, with some errors I needed to unbuild and rebuild. You can watch the full process video time lapse here (I have started to recording my builds, and the result looks awesome).

Until I build the Razor Crest (75292) I think is my favorite 2020 set.
